channel.title: Set Default Program/Open With... Does not work
channel.description:
After a fuckton of googling, searching, and tweaking, Windows still will not allow me to change the default program for ANY file type. I try to make uTorrent my main .torrent application, press OK, close, and it's still fucking set as Opera. I try to set Windows Preview or w.e to default for opening pictures, but it opens Photoshop every time. I try to make VLC my default video player, but it opens WMP every time.
Out of all my computers, this is the only one that does it. I never had this problem before, and I don't recall performing any actions that could even be close to making windows do this. Haven't changed any settings at all, but it worked before.

item.title: Set Default Program/Open With... Does not work
item.dc:creator: @DEFET DEFET
item.description:
@DEFET wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:2, topic:416880”]Have you tried messing with the registry? I’d back it up before you do any changes, but something like

HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT/file/shell/open/command

change the default value to what should be executed. Look at other file types for an example if you need it.[/quote]

edit: fixed it.

http://answers.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/forum/windows_7-files/problems-with-file-association-in-windows-7-64-bit/8a84fcec-22df-4942-8e35-d98dbe96e327

HcoJustin forgot the Applications folder, but it’s still a fucking pain doing this for every damn application.

Read full topic
item.source: Set Default Program/Open With... Does not work

item.source: Set Default Program/Open With... Does not work

item.title: Set Default Program/Open With... Does not work
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Have you tried messing with the registry? I’d back it up before you do any changes, but something like

HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT/file/shell/open/command

change the default value to what should be executed. Look at other file types for an example if you need it.

Read full topic
